layout.brandDescription: Your Statistics Companion. Free online calculators with APA-formatted results.
layout.haveLicenseKey: Have a license key? Activate here

home.heroDescription: Run statistical tests instantly and get results formatted in APA 7th edition. Export to Word with one click. Built by statisticians, for researchers.

ttest.name: Independent & Paired T-Test
ttest.description: Compare means between two groups. Get t-value, p-value, Cohen's d, and 95% CI.

anova.name: One-Way ANOVA
anova.description: Compare means across three or more groups. F-statistic, eta-squared, and post-hoc tests.

chiSquare.name: Chi-Square Test
chiSquare.description: Test of independence and goodness-of-fit. Chi-square statistic, Cramer's V.

correlation.name: Correlation
correlation.description: Pearson r and Spearman rho. Scatter plot visualization with regression line.

descriptive.name: Descriptive Statistics
descriptive.description: Mean, median, SD, skewness, kurtosis, quartiles, and more.

sampleSize.name: Sample Size Calculator
sampleSize.description: Power analysis for t-tests, ANOVA, correlation, chi-square & proportions.

oneSampleT.name: One-Sample T-Test
oneSampleT.description: Compare a sample mean against a known or hypothesized population value.

mannWhitney.name: Mann-Whitney U Test
mannWhitney.description: Non-parametric comparison of two independent groups. Rank-based alternative to t-test.

wilcoxon.name: Wilcoxon Signed-Rank
wilcoxon.description: Non-parametric test for paired samples. Alternative to paired t-test.

regression.name: Simple Linear Regression
regression.description: Model the relationship between X and Y. Equation, R², scatter plot.

apa.title: APA 7th Edition
apa.description: Results are automatically formatted to APA standards. No more manual formatting.

instant.title: Instant Results
instant.description: All calculations run in your browser. No server needed. Fast and private.

export.title: Export to Word
export.description: One-click export to .docx with perfect APA tables. Copy-paste into your paper.

step1.title: Enter Your Data
step1.description: Paste your data directly or enter summary statistics. Supports comma, space, or newline separated values.

step2.title: Get APA Results
step2.description: Click Calculate and get publication-ready results: test statistic, p-value, effect size, and confidence intervals.

step3.title: Export & Cite
step3.description: Copy results to clipboard or export APA-formatted tables to Word. Paste directly into your manuscript.

trust.validatedDescription: Every calculator in StatMate has been cross-validated against R (the gold standard for statistical computing) and SPSS. Our results match to at least 4 decimal places across all test statistics, p-values, and effect sizes.
trust.privacyDescription: Your data never leaves your device. All statistical calculations run entirely in your browser using client-side JavaScript. No data is uploaded, stored, or logged on our servers.
trust.openMethodology: Open methodology — uses jstat & simple-statistics libraries

home.aiSubtitle: Pro feature — see how AI explains your results in plain language

bottomCta.title: Used by researchers worldwide
bottomCta.description: Free forever. No sign-up. No credit card. Just paste your data and get APA-ready results.

calculator.enterData: Enter your data and click Calculate
calculator.tryExample: or click "Load Example" to try it out

ttest.metaTitle: Free T-Test Calculator Online - Independent & Paired
ttest.metaDescription: Free online t-test calculator. Independent samples and paired t-test with APA-formatted results. Get t-value, p-value, Cohen's d, and 95% CI instantly.
ttest.title: T-Test Calculator
ttest.description: Compare means between two groups using an independent or paired samples t-test. Results are formatted in APA 7th edition style.
ttest.independentDescription: Compare means from two separate, unrelated groups.
ttest.pairedDescription: Compare means from the same group at two time points (e.g., pre-test vs post-test).
ttest.errorPairedEqual: Paired t-test requires equal sample sizes in both groups.

anova.metaDescription: Free online one-way ANOVA calculator with APA-formatted results. F-statistic, p-value, eta-squared, and Bonferroni post-hoc tests.
anova.title: One-Way ANOVA Calculator
anova.description: Compare means across three or more groups. Results include F-statistic, p-value, eta-squared, and Bonferroni post-hoc tests in APA format.
anova.groupMinValues: Each group needs at least 2 values.

chiSquare.metaDescription: Free online chi-square calculator. Test of independence and goodness-of-fit with APA-formatted results. Chi-square statistic, p-value, Cramer's V.
chiSquare.title: Chi-Square Calculator
chiSquare.description: Test of independence for contingency tables and goodness-of-fit. Results are formatted in APA 7th edition style.
chiSquare.independenceDescription: Test whether two categorical variables are associated in a contingency table.
chiSquare.goodnessDescription: Test whether observed frequencies match expected frequencies.
chiSquare.errorMinCells: Please fill in all cells with valid numbers.
chiSquare.errorEqualLength: Observed and expected must have the same number of values.

correlation.metaTitle: Free Correlation Calculator Online - Pearson & Spearman
correlation.metaDescription: Free online correlation calculator. Pearson r and Spearman rho with APA-formatted results. Scatter plot visualization with regression line.
correlation.title: Correlation Calculator
correlation.description: Calculate Pearson r or Spearman rho between two variables. Results include scatter plot, p-value, and APA-formatted output.
correlation.pearsonDescription: Measure the strength and direction of the linear relationship between two continuous variables.
correlation.spearmanDescription: Measure the strength and direction of the monotonic relationship between two variables.
correlation.errorMinPairs: Each variable needs at least 3 values.
correlation.errorEqualLength: Both variables must have the same number of values.

descriptive.metaDescription: Free online descriptive statistics calculator. Mean, median, mode, SD, skewness, kurtosis, quartiles and more with APA-formatted results.
descriptive.title: Descriptive Statistics Calculator
descriptive.description: Calculate mean, median, mode, standard deviation, skewness, kurtosis, quartiles, and more. Results are formatted in APA 7th edition style.
descriptive.inputDescription: Enter a list of numbers to compute descriptive statistics.
descriptive.errorMinValues: Need at least 2 values for descriptive statistics.

pricing.metaDescription: StatMate Pro: Export APA tables to Word, get AI-powered interpretation, and publication-ready result sentences. Start with a 7-day free trial.
pricing.headline: Start Free.
pricing.headlineHighlight: Go Pro When You Need It.
pricing.subheadline: All calculators are free forever. Upgrade to Pro for APA Word export, AI-powered interpretation, and publication-ready results.

free.name: Free
free.description: Everything you need for basic analysis

pricing.payPerUse: Don't need a subscription? Pay $2.99 per export — no commitment required.

faqs.q: Can I use the calculators without signing up?
faqs.a: Yes! All calculators are completely free and require no sign-up. You can calculate t-tests, ANOVA, chi-square, correlation, and descriptive statistics instantly.

faqs.q: What does the AI interpretation include?
faqs.a: Our AI analyzes your statistical results and generates: (1) a publication-ready result sentence in APA format, (2) a plain-language interpretation anyone can understand, and (3) important caveats and limitations to consider.

faqs.q: What format is the Word export?
faqs.a: We generate APA 7th edition formatted tables in .docx format. Tables follow APA guidelines: no vertical lines, proper header formatting, italic statistical symbols (M, SD, t, F, p), and Times New Roman 12pt font.
Yes. You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll keep Pro access until the end of your billing period.
All calculations run in your browser. Your raw data never leaves your device. For AI interpretation, only the computed statistics (not your raw data) are sent to our server.
We're planning student pricing soon. For now, the 7-day free trial and pay-per-use option ($2.99/export) make it affordable for any student.

pricing.ctaTitle: Ready to save hours on formatting?
pricing.ctaDescription: Start your 7-day free trial. No credit card required.

about.metaDescription: StatMate is a free online statistics calculator built by statisticians for researchers.
about.title: About StatMate
about.intro: <bold>StatMate</bold> is a free online statistics calculator designed for researchers, graduate students, and anyone who needs quick, accurate statistical analysis with publication-ready results.
about.mission: We believe statistical analysis should be accessible to everyone. Whether you're writing your first research paper or your hundredth, StatMate helps you get accurate results formatted in APA 7th edition style — no expensive software required.

differences.apa: <bold>APA-Ready:</bold> Results are automatically formatted following APA 7th edition guidelines. Copy and paste directly into your paper.
differences.privacy: <bold>Privacy First:</bold> All calculations run in your browser. Your raw data never leaves your device.
differences.builtBy: <bold>Built by Statisticians:</bold> Every calculator is built and verified by statistics professionals with years of research experience.
differences.free: <bold>Always Free:</bold> Core calculators are free forever. No sign-up required.

about.contactText: Have feedback, found a bug, or want to request a new calculator? We'd love to hear from you.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Try one of our free statistics calculators instead.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Your data hasn't been lost — try refreshing the page.

pro.unlockDescription: Get publication-ready sentences in English or Korean
pro.exportDescFree: Download a perfectly formatted Word document
pro.activateDescription: Enter the license key you received after purchase.

privacy.metaDescription: StatMate Privacy Policy. All calculations run in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

terms.metaDescription: StatMate Terms of Service. Free online statistics calculators.
terms.title: Terms of Service

sampleSize.metaTitle: Free Sample Size Calculator Online - Power Analysis
sampleSize.metaDescription: Free online sample size calculator. Power analysis for t-tests, ANOVA, correlation, chi-square, and proportions. Get required N with APA-formatted results.
sampleSize.title: Sample Size Calculator
sampleSize.description: Calculate the required sample size for your study using power analysis. Supports t-tests, ANOVA, correlation, chi-square, and proportion tests.
sampleSize.inputDescription: Select your test type, effect size, significance level, and desired power.
sampleSize.errorEffectSize: Effect size must be greater than 0.

oneSampleT.metaDescription: Free online one-sample t-test calculator. Compare your sample mean to a known value with APA-formatted results, Cohen's d, and 95% CI.
oneSampleT.title: One-Sample T-Test Calculator
oneSampleT.description: Compare your sample mean to a known or hypothesized value. Results include t-statistic, p-value, Cohen's d, and 95% CI in APA format.
oneSampleT.testValueHint: The population mean or hypothesized value to compare against

mannWhitney.metaTitle: Free Mann-Whitney U Test Calculator Online
mannWhitney.metaDescription: Free online Mann-Whitney U test calculator. Non-parametric test for comparing two independent groups with APA-formatted results.
mannWhitney.title: Mann-Whitney U Test Calculator
mannWhitney.description: Non-parametric alternative to the independent samples t-test. Compare two independent groups without assuming normal distribution.

wilcoxon.metaTitle: Free Wilcoxon Signed-Rank Test Calculator Online
wilcoxon.metaDescription: Free online Wilcoxon signed-rank test calculator. Non-parametric paired test with APA-formatted results. Compare pre/post measurements.
wilcoxon.title: Wilcoxon Signed-Rank Test Calculator
wilcoxon.description: Non-parametric alternative to the paired samples t-test. Compare two related measurements without assuming normal distribution.
wilcoxon.errorEqualLength: Pre and post arrays must have equal length.

regression.metaTitle: Free Simple Linear Regression Calculator Online
regression.metaDescription: Free online simple linear regression calculator. R-squared, F-test, coefficients, scatter plot with APA-formatted results.
regression.title: Simple Linear Regression Calculator
regression.description: Fit a linear model to your data. Results include R², F-test, regression coefficients, scatter plot, and APA-formatted output.
regression.errorEqualLength: X and Y must have the same number of values.
